text: Hello, sir ! They’re making a fool of me. I’m the butt of the joke, I’m at my wit's end QUACK !
<textjump=0.5|1|5>Hello, what’s happening to you? Who is making a fool of you?</textjump>
<textjump=0.5|1|5>Calm down sir, and explain the situation to me clearly.</textjump>

<textjump=0.2|2|10><textspeed=50> Well, here it is, you must know me, but I willintroduce myself anyway.<textpause=0.50> I am the illustriousFlipper<color=#6500c5></textjump> <textjump=0.2|-1|10> THE COYOTE OF THE SEAS </textjump><textjump=0.2|2|10></color=#6500c5>, the best Olympic swimmer for several years ! <textpause=0.15> And I am furious because everyone envies and admires me to the point of wanting to steal my spot at any cost ! </textjump>
<textjump=0.5|1|5><textspeed=15> It’s natural to admire you to the point of wanting to surpass you, that’s the spirit of sports, right? </textjump>
<textjump=0.5|1|5><textspeed=15> I don’t know you<textspeed=15> But<textspeed=15> What do you mean by stealing your spot ? </textjump>
<textjump=0.5|1|5><textspeed=50> If that were all! <textpause=0.5> They had already tried to disadvantage me in a competition,<textpause=0.5> but this is on a whole different level ! </textjump>
<textjump=0.5|1|5><textspeed=50> But yes, they try stealing my spot as number one. </textjump>
<textjump=0.5|1|5><textspeed=50> They’re preventing me from competing, it’s cheating, it’s a <color=red>conspiracy</color> ! </textjump>
<textjump=0.5|1|5><textspeed=15>A conspiracy, you say? But how are 'they' preventing you from competing? </textjump>
<textjump=0.5|1|5><textspeed=15> Did someone forbid you from competing ? </textjump>

<textjump=0.5|1|5><textspeed=50> The law prohibits anyone blue citizen from going into a pool because they wouldn’t be visible enough. As a result, I can no longer train or participate in tournaments! If you ask me, they do this because they fear I'll win again ! </textjump>

<textjump=0.5|1|5><textspeed=15> You feel like the world revolves around you, but maybe there’s a reason behind these actions that has nothing to do with you ? What makes you think the world is against you ? </textjump>
<textjump=0.5|1|5><textspeed=15> Perhaps there have been accidents involving blue people who couldn’t be rescued because they weren’t visible ? Why is this so important to you ? </textjump>
<textjump=0.5|1|5> Of course, I’m a star, so obviously these law targets me and no one else ! </textjump>
<textjump=0.5|1|5> You think ? In that case, maybe there’s a solution for me to compete again…</textjump>
<textjump=0.5|1|5> But you know, I... I could never fly... What a shame for a duck. That's why I became the fastest duck on the water! Even if it's not enough to make me blossom. </textjump>

<textjump=0.5|1|5><textspeed=15> Well, I think I have what I need, let’s begin the hypnosis.
Focus on my watch and imagine yourself racing across the ocean. You pass by a boat and hear the passengers calling out to you… </textjump>
<textjump=0.5|1|5><textspeed=15>The legend </textjump>
<textjump=0.5|1|5><textspeed=15> The coyote of the seas </textjump>
<textjump=0.5|1|5> Uh… why not. </textjump>
<textjump=0.5|1|5> What a lovely name to match my stature ! </textjump>
<textjump=0.5|1|5><textspeed=15> Imagine your future life. <textpause=0.5> Do you prefer to continue competing or learn to fly ? </textjump>
<textjump=0.5|1|5><textspeed=15> Continue competing. </textjump>
<textjump=0.5|1|5><textspeed=15> Learn to fly. </textjump>
<textjump=0.5|1|5>It’s pointless to continue competing, they are meaningless to me now. But do you think I could… learn to fly?</textjump>
<textjump=0.5|1|5>It’s pointless to continue competing, they are meaningless to me now. But do you think I could… learn to fly?</textjump>
<textjump=0.5|1|5><textspeed=15> You can do anything by listening to my voice. </textjump>
<textjump=0.5|1|5><textspeed=15> With training, anything is possible ! </textjump>
<textjump=0.5|1|5>It’s pointless to continue competing,<textpause=0.5> they are meaningless to me now.<textpause=0.65>  But do you think I could…<textpause=0.25>  learn to fly ?</textjump>
<textjump=0.5|1|5>In the meantime,<textpause=0.5> I’ve never succeeded,<textpause=0.5> I’ve tried my best…</textjump>
<textjump=0.5|1|5><textspeed=15> Think of something that would bring you great happiness. </textjump>
<textjump=0.5|1|5>Like <textpause=0.5> what ? </textjump>
<textjump=0.5|1|5><textspeed=15> You, who are on the victory podium ! </textjump>
<textjump=0.5|1|5><textspeed=15> Flying among the clouds with your family. </textjump>

<textjump=0.5|1|10>Yes… I should appreciate it,<textpause=0.5> but these competitions are meaningless, and this sudden stop made me realize that.<textpause=0.5> <textspeed=50> I’ve understood my problem, goodbye !</textjump>
<textjump=0.5|1|5>I would like… to have a family with children who love me… and be able to fly with them. </textjump>
<textjump=0.5|1|5><textspeed=15> On my count,<textpause=0.5> you will learn to fly on your own wings !<textpause=0.5> Go ! </textjump>
